site.description: To install Erlide, please point your Eclipse Update Manager at this site. We support Eclipse 3.2 and later.

category-def.name: stable
category-def.label: Stable builds
category-def.description: These builds have been around a little longer and are reasonably stable.

category-def.name: unstable
category-def.label: Unstable builds
category-def.description: These bulds may be broken, so use at your own risk.
